Actions.Name: Hungry Forest
Actions.Delay: The [name]'s next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, the area erupts again. Foes in the area take [fray] damage twice. Allies in the area are cured.

Actions.Name: Bloom
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a space of difficult terrain in the area. Allies in the area when it is created gain 2 vigor.

Actions.Name: Ancient Heal
Actions.Description: The [name] gains aura 2 until the start of their next turn. All characters in the aura that start their turn there gain 2 vigor.

Actions.Name: Overgrow
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. At the end of that foe's turn, if they have not moved at least 4 spaces at the start of their turn, they become immobile as the undergrowth grows over their feet. This effect ends when they take any amount of damage, or they or an adjacent character can hack the growth away with the interact ability (1 action), dealing 4 piercing damage to them but ending the effect.
